title: Where there is more than one staircase serving a building, there shall be at least one smoke- stop door in the space between the staircases
clause_text: Where there is more than one staircase serving a building, there shall be at least one smoke- stop door in the space between the staircases.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Where there is more than one staircase serving a building, there shall be at least one smoke- stop door in the space between the staircases.
